title: WOMENS CUTS
des: Hair is shaped and texturized to deliver the desired look and enhance face shape and highlight features. Includes shampoo, scalp massage, cut and blowdry style.

title: SPECIALTY HAIRCUTTING
des: Advanced haircutting techniques designed especially for curly hair, precision dry cutting, and avant-garde methods all fall under the umbrella of specialty haircutting. These services require additional training and mastery by stylists and demand a premium price.

title: EXPRESS HAIR
des: Salon hair color has undergone a renaissance in the last five years. Gone are the days when women simply came in for gray coverage or a few highlights.

title: FULL FOIL
des: Creates dimensional color using foils on the front, crown, and back of the hair. Includes gloss and blowdry style.

title: DOUBLE PROCESS COLOR
des: Bleach is used to lighten the hair, followed by a gloss/toner. This service is often needed before applying fashion colors or to achieve a platinum blonde result. Includes blowdry style.

title: BOND REPAIR TREATMENT
des: A bond repair treatment is incorporated as an add-on to a color service for damaged or compromised hair. A bond multiplier is added to the color formula, and then a bond perfector is applied following color service.

title: CHEMICAL WAVING
des: A safe way to achieve long-lasting curls or waves and reduce styling time. A gentle formula is applied to hair that has been wrapped to achieve a customized curl pattern.
